title: Fenwick, Dr Julienne - Integrative Medicine
description: Dr Julienne Fenwick, MBChB (Stell) is a trained and registered medical doctor, who employs a Functional Medicine approach in her practice, Best of Both Wellness, Hermanus, South Africa. She uses the latest diagnostic tests and individualized treatment protocols to treat and prevent chronic disease. Dr Julienne combines allopathic with integrative modalities such as CoMra low-energy laser therapy, bio-puncture and intravenous vitamin infusions as indicated (for pain management, inflammation control and stem-cell regeneration). sitename: South African Society of Integrated Medicine
cleaned_text: Membership Category Description Dr Julienne Fenwick, MBChB (Stell) is a trained and registered medical doctor, who employs a Functional Medicine approach in her practice, Best of Both Wellness, Hermanus, South Africa. She uses the latest diagnostic tests and individualized treatment protocols to treat and prevent chronic disease. Dr Julienne combines allopathic with integrative modalities such therapy, bio-puncture and intravenous vitamin infusions as indicated (for pain management, inflammation control and stem-cell regeneration).
